He begins by turning his head slowly to face forward, then shifts it smoothly to the side as if considering his words, before returning his gaze to the front with deliberate calm. As he speaks, his mouth opens with expressive ease, lips moving fluidly to shape each syllable with clarity and presence. His shoulders remain relaxed, his upper body leaning just slightly forward to convey attentiveness. There is no tension in his movement; every gesture flows naturally, reinforcing the sincerity of his speech.
